content.query:
COPY INTO dbo.StageStation (
    StationName,
    StationComplex,
    Borough,
    IsHistorical,
    ServiceAvailable,
    WifiAvailable
)
FROM 'https://mtapipelinestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/files/updated_data/Month=2/'
WITH
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET',
    MAXERRORS = 0,
    IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
);
